cartmod.accurate_client_minecarts.descri: Runs the same minecart movement code on the client as on the server. Currently only in singleplayer worlds.
cartmod.no_cart_interpolation.descriptio: Disables the client interpolation capability. Instead position packets set the client side cart position like with other entities.
cartmod.always_sync_cart_position.descri: Server sends the minecart position to the client every tick.
cartmod.display_cart_position.descriptio: Client displays the last received minecart position.
cartmod.custom_cart_speed.description: Sets minecarts to a custom speed limit when on rails.
cartmod.display_cart_data.velocity.descr: Displays the velocity vector above minecarts.
cartmod.display_cart_data.speed.descript: Displays the absolute velocity above minecarts.
cartmod.display_cart_data.fill_level.des: Displays the fill level of storage minecarts above them.
cartmod.display_cart_data.on_ground.desc: Displays whether minecarts are on ground above them
cartmod.display_cart_data.in_water.descr: Displays whether minecarts are touching water (client side). Requires accurate client minecarts.
Displays the slowdown rate of minecarts (client side)
cartmod.display_cart_data.estimated_dist: Displays an estimate of the distance the minecart can travel with the current velocity and slowdown rate
cartmod.rotate_cart_to_rail.description: Rotates minecarts on non-curved rails to fix unexpected pushing behavior of minecarts
